Thurlow Bergen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thurlow_Bergen 0 Thurlow Bergen (January 14, 1875 – 1940(?)) was an American actor of stage and silent film. His wife was Broadway actress Elsie Esmond. Thurlow_Bergen ( January_14_,_1875 – 1940 ( ? ) ) was an_American_actor of stage and silent_film . His_wife was Broadway_actress_Elsie_Esmond .
